sentence.Network_en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentence.Network_en: The United States plans to tighten the economic sanctions currently in place.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国计划加大现有经济制裁的力度。

sentence.Network_en: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 总结一些英语写作常用副词（六级）_百度知道 ... 现在 at present,now 目前 currently 最近 recently,lately.
新概念第三册精解 ... currency n. 流通（货币） currently adv. 普遍地，通常地，现在，当前 sculptural adj. 雕刻的，雕刻般的.
新概念第三册精解 ... currency n. 流通（货币） currently adv. 普遍地，通常地，现在，当前 sculptural adj. 雕刻的，雕刻般的.
...to the cause of AIDS prevention and cure in China.currently 现在;一般;流畅地;目前现在;通称地，普遍地，当前;目前，眼前地。campaign 战役;运动，活动;竞选运动;从事运动;竞选运动;作战，出征。.

entry.def: A current is a steady and continuous flowing movement of some of the water in a river, lake, or sea.

example.ex: Under normal conditions, the ocean currents of the tropical Pacific travel from east to west...
example.tran: 在正常情况下，太平洋的热带洋流自东向西流。

example.ex: The couple were swept away by the strong current.
example.tran: 这对夫妻被巨大的水流卷走了。

entry.def: A current is a steady flowing movement of air.

example.ex: I felt a current of cool air blowing in my face.
example.tran: 我觉得脸上有一阵冷风吹过。

entry.def: An electric current is a flow of electricity through a wire or circuit.

example.ex: A powerful electric current is passed through a piece of graphite.
example.tran: 给一块石墨通入强电流。

entry.def: A particular current is a particular feeling, idea, or quality that exists within a group of people.

example.ex: Each party represents a distinct current of thought...
example.tran: 每个党派代表一种不同的思潮。

example.ex: A strong current of nationalism runs through ideology and politics in the Arab world.
example.tran: 一股强烈的民族主义思潮涌入阿拉伯世界的思想体系和政治体系。

entry.tran: 现时的;当前的;进行中的
entry.def: Current means happening, being used, or being done at the present time.

example.ex: The current situation is very different to that in 1990...
example.tran: 当前的形势与1990年截然不同。

example.ex: He plans to repeal a number of current policies...
example.tran: 他计划废除一些当前的政策。

entry.def: Ideas and customs that are current are generally accepted and used by most people.

example.ex: Current thinking suggests that toxins only have a small part to play in the build up of cellulite...
example.tran: 目前普遍认为，毒素对皮下脂肪团堆积影响不大。

example.ex: This custom was still current in the late 1960s.
example.tran: 这种习俗在20世纪60年代末仍然很普遍。

means.word_mean: 1. at this time or period; now;

sentences.sentence: "he is presently our ambassador to the United Nations"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second, Zaat, is currently under production.

auth_sentence.content: The quickest journey currently is just under two hours.
auth_sentence.res_content: The quickest journey currently is just under two hours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The quickest journey currently is just under two hours.

auth_sentence.content: He is currently a member of the band Groundhog.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is currently a member of the band Groundhog.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is currently a member of the band Groundhog.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: For these reasons I think physical books will have a longer existence as a commercial product than some currently predict.
High school degrees offer far less in the way of preparation for work than they might, or than many other nations currently offer, creating a growing skills gap in our economy.
And it's true that there are currently more people applying for each available job opening, regardless of whether it's a new one or not.

Stored underground in large salt caves in Louisiana, this stockpile is called the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and currently contains over 600 million barrels of oil, roughly equivalent to one month's supply.

Late-stage developing nations that are currently industrialising rapidly, for example China, which will experience declining rates of population growth, coupled with increasing affluence (富裕）and age profile
Better irrigation can dramatically improve crop yield and about 40% of the world's food supply is currently derived from irrigated land.

sentences.en: Our contracts are currently under review.
She is currently appearing at the Liverpool Playhouse.
sentences.cn: 她目前正在利物浦剧院演出。

sentences.en: Tara is currently working on a solo album.
sentences.cn: 塔拉眼下正忙着制作个人专辑。
